sections.heading: Assignment
sections.text: of thing in action not to prejudice defense.

sections.heading: Parent
sections.text: or guardian may maintain action for seduction.

sections.heading: Parent
sections.text: or guardian may maintain action for injury of minor child.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: not to abate by death of any party after verdict.

sections.heading: State
sections.text:
and local governmental agencies may be sued without naming members of their

governing bodies; service.

sections.heading: Limitation
sections.text:
on commencement of lawsuit against manufacturer or distributor of firearm or

ammunition or trade association related to firearms or ammunition; exception

for breach of contract or warranty.

sections.heading: Associates
sections.text: may be sued by name of association; summons; judgment to bind joint property.

sections.heading: Unknown
sections.text:
heirs to real property may be made parties; allegations and proof that names

and residences of heirs are unknown.

sections.heading: Intervention:
sections.text: Right to intervention; procedure, determination and costs; exception.
